Reviews.Title: “Amazing stay, Awesome Breakfast & Super Clean!”
Reviews.Author: simonepress
Reviews.Content: love tripadvisor scan reviews various hotels book hotel noticed gotten amazing reviews paid 100 usd night december considered peak travel time istanbul hotel lived hype bit coming home dream breakfasts served dream neat tidy clean lovely view roof garden absolutely loved hotel hope youll stay deals spots town stay hotel centrally located popular istanbul hotels youll notice walk streets tons tour offices inns hotels souvenir shops cafes etc youre tourist hotel 10 minute walk hagya sofya blue mosque reviews talks uphill walk bad particularly steep hill youre walking sightseeing destinations rest arent bad youre near hagya mosque easy access trams buses etc run throughout city allow various found bus system easy figure asia afternoon try food amazing hotel smallish definitely cramped mean istanbul milwaukee space bathrooms absolutely clean modern goodsize shower safe heatingac stayed winter kept heat absolutely lovely window ac youre traveling times lobby complete little pool filled turtles various birds cafe serve coffee internet people purchase time internet cafes cheaper onto cheap email definitely convenient elevators throughout hotel breakfasts absolutely amazing served hotels roofdeck closed space space parallel sit outside nice views spectacular ocean theres gorgeous view sofya church mosque definitely exciting spot eat breakfast food absolutely incredible coffee eggs delicious tons treats grape leaves turkish delight toast yogurts toppings honeycomb food spectacular view missed staff guy concierge awesome hes helpful bits info brother staying europe laundry spot directions super helpful suggesting asia day super helpful restaurant top floor hotel bfast served serves delicious modern turkish cuisine hotel allowed amazing stay clean comfy modern food delicious location prime stay id absolutely suggest

Reviews.Content: quaint hotel clean cute cozy breakfast terms food hotel quiet hustle bustle city minutes 1015 minute walk sultanahmet ie hagia sofia etc catch tram city train available close goes city staff friendly helpfulwould definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Armada, the prefect place for a conference”
Reviews.Author: Willem60
Reviews.Content: recently stayed nights hotel armada due unesco conference invited time wonderful city istanbul hotel expectations decent clean spacy equiped wireless internet wonderful turkish breakfast top floor wonderful view sea marmara bosphorus gentle customer friendly service hotel excellent middle size conferences am book leisure weekend
